task.title: Turning the phone on or off

context.p: You may wish to turn your phone off when you do not wish to receive calls. For example:

ul.li: you are in a meeting and do not want to be disturbed.
you are in an environment in which you do not want to disturb others (e.g., a theater or a lecture).

context.p: Turning off the phone when you do not wish to receive calls will conserve the battery life between chargings. When your phone is off, incoming calls will be directed to your voicemail. Incoming calls are also reflected in your call log.
To turn the phone on or off:

step.cmd: Press the Power key, and hold it down for 1 full second.
